body: Nice catch ! The TODO are indicative, we can do them for 2.17.0 or later there's no hard constraints about that.

issue.title: [cleanup] Remove the script for checking changelog

labels.name: Maintenance

labels.name: Skip news :mute:

milestone.title: 3.0.0a6
milestone.description: Actual removal of most deprecated functions and API.

repository.name: pylint
repository.description: It's not just a linter that annoys you!

issue.body:
## Type of Changes

<!-- Leave the corresponding lines for the applicable type of change: -->

|     | Type                   |
| --- | ---------------------- |
| ✓   | :hammer: Refactoring   |

## Description

There's no more changelog to check. Since 2.16 we use tbump
to generate the changelog from fragments and there's a script
to check fragment 'check-newsfragments'.

We should not modify the legacy changelog, or very little.

Refs #8335
